model
Class ProvidesPort.PackIterator

java.lang.Object
  model.ProvidesPort.PackIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator
Enclosing class:
ProvidesPort
private class ProvidesPort.PackIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator

Iterator that packs elements returned by a specified underlying iterator in packs of a specified size. Each pack is return by the next method within an array. The elements of this array are obtained from the underlying iterator using its next iteratively.

The remove is not provided, throwing an exception if invoked.

Author:
Ricardo Corrï¿½a (correa@lia.ufc.br)
